description: The RockWall is a dual port USB wall charger with15.5W of power to simultaneously quick-charge your iPad and iPhone/iPod. It accommodates various international plug adapters making the only charger you need when traveling abroad. It also has a swiveling base so it can be connected to an outlet strip on the floor, an outlet on the wall or folded flat for portability. As a combo set, it also comes with a charge/sync cable. ILuv Creative Technology, the premier provider of the most comprehensive accessories line for the Apple and smartphone markets, rapidly delivers award winning products for today's discriminating consumers. Since inception, iLuv has amassed an impressive total of 16 prestigious CES Innovations awards, recognized for design and engineering in the Portable Multimedia Accessories, Headphones and the In-Vehicle Accessory categories. Headquartered in New York, iLuv is a division of jWIN Electronics Corp., a leading consumer electronics company since 1997. All iLuv products are conceived, designed and developed in New York and continue to lead in quality, value, design and innovation.
title: iLuv RockWall Combo - Dual USB Wall Charger and Sync Cable (IAD730WHT)
